title: Housing Society Manegment
description: Successfully developed the website from scratch using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP and Bootstrap. Hosted website on PhpMyAdmin and connected it with MySQL

title: Airline Reservation System
description: Designed and developed an online Airlines Ticket Reservation System using Java Swing and stored the data in MySQL to be used by the front end.

title: Online Bakery Store
description: Developed Self Online Ordering system for the customers using Android studio and MySQL for Data Storage. This application assisted the customers in customizing the cake as well as making the payment online along with the order tracking system.

title: Expense App
description: While learning React from Udemy, I successfully created an Expense App by using TypeScript and Material UI framework for styling.

title: My Portfolio
description: I've developed a dynamic portfolio showcasing my frontend expertise, using React, JavaScript, and Framer Motion. Leveraging JSON for data management and Visual Studio for development, I've created an engaging user experience with fluid animations and seamless transitions.
